text:
There is a new HubSpot podcast in the works hosted by <@UD53A9UUR> from the HubSpot Community. This will be an AMA style show driven by community activity, and guess what? The first episode is focusing on A11y!

You can help guide our conversation <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/We-are-starting-a-podcast-1st-topic-Accessibility-with-Jon/m-p/398618/thread-id/20441|by submitting any questions you have on the topic over here>. Dennis, <@U7SL518D6>, <@UQ3DGT8VC> and I will then string the questions together and address them together.

Really excited to have this conversation! Please help us make it super valuable by participating in that post. :pray:
